ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2003_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Time to
get energized! Are you ready to have lots of
fun today?
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2101_02_10: Let me know if you find a good use for it!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
Actually, I’ve a present for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2102_02_10: I had a feeling you might need this!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2103_01_10: Hiya! Here’s a present with an old royal touch!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2103_02_10: I kept it just for you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
What do you wanna chat about today,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]? Something fun?
Or maybe something exciting!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2302_01_10: Oh, is this for me? Thank you!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
I’m so happy! You know me so well,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2402_01_10: I had so much fun chatting with you! See ya later!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8201_2401_02_10:
Let’s do this again! Next time, I’ll be ready with
loads of interesting things to talk about!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8001_0701_01_10: It’s so calm and peaceful here, don’t you think?
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8001_0701_02_10: I can fully relax, as if I’m back at Aether House.
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8001_0701_03_10:
It’s so nice to have a place I can call home on
Pasio, too!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
My goal is to help all the Trainers at Aether House
become the strongest!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna teach them everything I’ve learned
on Pasio!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
I hope you can battle with them when they’re
stronger, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
I’m like a big sister to everyone back at
Aether House, but...
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
When I’m with you, [Name:PlayerNickname ],
I feel like I can depend on you—and maybe even
act a little spoiled!
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
I wonder if everyone back home felt the same
about me...
ch0007_00_acerola_salon/8003_0701_04_10: I sure hope they did! Heehee!
